title: Mira's Milestone: Thriving Beyond Early Diagnosis
text: Diagnosed with dyslexia at an early age, Mira's parents were concerned about her future. With the tailored support and resources from Zeen, Mira began to thrive. The platform helped her develop unique coping mechanisms and strengths. Today, Mira isn't just succeeding academically; she's proudly writing her own short stories, proving that early intervention and dedicated support can unlock incredible potential.

title: Rohan's Resilience: Embracing His Unique Learning Style
text: Rohan often felt isolated due to his dysgraphia. Zeen introduced him to alternative methods of expression and learning, helping him embrace his unique cognitive style. He learned to use technology to his advantage and found a community that understood him. Rohan is now an advocate for neurodiversity, inspiring others to celebrate their differences.

title: Sneha's Spark: From Numbers Anxiety to Math Whiz
text: Sneha had severe anxiety around mathematics due to dyscalculia. Through Zeen's interactive, step-by-step approach, she started to see numbers differently. The platform made learning fun and relatable, breaking down complex concepts. Sneha not only conquered her fear but also developed a strong aptitude for problem-solving, surprising everyone with her newfound love for math.
